overview: The latest hardcore FOOT FETISH film from Viv Thomas is one of the most anticipated movies this year. Carefully chosen girls from London and Eastern Europe make up the cast to die for.  Based on Viv's own personal memoirs we get to see some of the best HARDCORE leg and foot sex ever filmed.  Arches and ankles, defined legs, stockings, high-heels, and some of the sexiest little toes and feet getting spunked over by foot man Steve Hooper.  Even the cameraman on this movie had a foot fetish!  "MEMOIRES" contains over 2hrs 45 min of unbelievable sex, which will blow away anyone - even people who don't have a foot fetish!  It is quite simply a modern day classic.
title: Memoirs of a Foot Fetist
